title: Sweet banana and maple pancakes with blueberries and pecans
description: This gluten-free take on the classic pancake is perfect with sliced bananas, berries and toasted nuts. They also work brilliantly with lemon and sugar.  The simple and effective mix of gluten-free flours in this recipe will also work for most baking recipes.Read our guide to supercharging your pancakes.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need a food processor.
